channel.title: Client Help [PI]
channel.description: So my webclient loads and it downloads the cache but when a friend or someone tries to login it says "Error connecting to server". I changed the 'server = ' in client.java (Client sided) to my no-ip and I also tried using my IP but neither worked. It still said "Error connecting to server". Please helpppp!

item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

Is the port correct?

So my webclient loads and it downloads the cache but when a friend or someone tries to login it says “Error connecting to server”.
